message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPOSITIONLINK_RV_ORGSTRUCTURE_CANCELED
message.locale: A position cannot be added to an organization unit within a canceled organization structure.
A position cannot be added to an organisation unit within a cancelled organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPOSITIONLINK_RV_POSITION_CANCELED
message.locale: A canceled position cannot be added to an organization unit.
A cancelled position cannot be added to an organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPOSITIONLINK_RV_ORGUNIT_CANCELED
message.locale: A position cannot be added to a canceled organization unit.
A position cannot be added to a cancelled organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPOSITIONLINK_XRV_POSITION_NOT_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This position has not been added to this organization unit.
This position has not been added to this organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPOSITIONLINK_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This position has already been removed from the organization unit.
This position has already been removed from the organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_ORGUNITPOSITIONLINK_XRV_POSITION_ALREADY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This position has already been added to this organization unit.
This position has already been added to this organisation unit.
